message.raw:
Fixed a bug and released the h5 file lock before programming

* The static_data frequency was only being programmed to a precision of 1Hz because "%f" by default prints 6 decimal places and the number sent to the NovaTech was in MHz
* We now copy data out of the h5 file, release the file, and then program the device. This should enable asynchronous programming of hardware devices.
message.html:
Fixed a bug and released the h5 file lock before programming

  • The static_data frequency was only being programmed to a precision of 1Hz because "%f" by default prints 6 decimal places and the number sent to the NovaTech was in MHz
  • We now copy data out of the h5 file, release the file, and then program the device. This should enable asynchronous programming of hardware devices.
